alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 30 at 1:37PM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Nevada... East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason affecting Lyon County. .Increased snow melt and reservoir releases will produce high river flows. Expect minor flooding downstream from the dam. For the East Walker River...including Strosnider Ditch Near Mason... minor flooding is ongoing and forecast to continue. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and will continue. * WHERE...East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.5 feet, Flood Stage, minor flooding in reach. East Walker Road closed and other low rural roads likely closed at lowest points. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM PDT Friday the stage was 8.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:45 PM PDT Friday was 8.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady near minor flood stage. - Action stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood stage is 8.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when camping or hiking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.cnrfc.noaa.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon.
